'''''Quicksand Adventurer (II)''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Sumeru: The Gilded Desert - Series II]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete seven [[Time Trial Challenge]]s in the [[Desert of Hadramaveth]].
